code: import{ADD_TODO,REMOVE_TODO,TOGGLE_TODO}from"../actions/todos";var comments=function comments(store){return function(next){return function(action){if(action.type===ADD_TODO&&action.todo.name!==""){alert("Don't forget to "+action.todo.name);}else if(action.type===REMOVE_TODO){return next(action);}else if(action.type===TOGGLE_TODO){return next(action);}else{alert("Bad Idea!!!");return"";}return next(action);};};};export default comments;
